overview: We've gone back to Eastern Europe to experience the prime crop of Czech guyus. This time we've taken them to a country farmyard where nature takes it's course. Experience Johan Paulik and six other young men in this program of exceptional beauty and sublime sensuality. Alone and together, these young men follow the most natural of instincts - from innocence to manhood. Boy 4: Boy Oh Boy is beautifully filmed, sensitvely handled and an exceptional fourth episode in the Boy video series.
title: Boy 4: Boy Oh Boy
